did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Scrapbook of Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder, 1990-1992

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder. Scrapbook, 1990-1992. Accession 39576, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from Library of Virginia, Technical Services, 22 May 2002.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook, 1990-1992, compiled by the Governor's Office, includes copies of news articles about or by Governor Lawrence Douglas Wilder and selected excerpts of remarks made by the Governor. Included are articles from several magazines and newspapers including the Atlanta Journal, Baltimore Jewish Times, Boston Globe, Financial World, Newsweek, New York Times, Reader's Digest, Time magazine, U.S. News and World Report, Virginia Business, and the Wall Street Journal, among others. The Scrapbook includes about fifty articles.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The scrapbook is arranged alphabetically by news articles author's surname.
